Containers.Name: binhex-rider
Containers.Description: JetBrains Rider is a cross-platform .NET IDE based on the IntelliJ platform and ReSharper. Rider supports .NET Framework, the new cross-platform .NET Core, and Mono based projects. This lets you develop a wide range of applications including .NET desktop applications, services and libraries, Unity games, Xamarin apps, ASP.NET and ASP.NET Core web applications.[br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] This is where rider will store it's configuration files, database and logs.[br]
Containers.Overview: JetBrains Rider is a cross-platform .NET IDE based on the IntelliJ platform and ReSharper. Rider supports .NET Framework, the new cross-platform .NET Core, and Mono based projects. This lets you develop a wide range of applications including .NET desktop applications, services and libraries, Unity games, Xamarin apps, ASP.NET and ASP.NET Core web applications. Note:- This application requires a license, otherwise it will run in Evaluation Mode for 30 days.
Containers.DonateText: If you appreciate my work, then please consider buying me a beer :D
